Straw Dogs is a 2011 American psychological thriller film directed, produced, and 
written by Rod Lurie. It is a remake of Sam Peckinpah's 1971 film Straw Dogs, 
itself based on the Gordon Williams novel The Siege of Trencher's Farm. It stars 
James Marsden and Kate Bosworth.
